scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn test:midi-bricks && yarn test:midi-bricks-electron
scripts.build: yarn build:midi-bricks-doc && yarn build:midi-bricks && yarn build:midi-bricks-electron
scripts.build:midi-bricks-doc: cd packages/midi-bricks-doc && yarn && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.build:midi-bricks-electron: cd packages/midi-bricks && yarn && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.build:midi-bricks-electron-ci: cd packages/midi-bricks && yarn && yarn build-ci && cd ..
scripts.publish-retry: lerna publish --yes from-package --force-publish $(ls packages/) && yarn deploy
scripts.deploy: yarn deploy:midi-bricks-doc && yarn deploy:midi-bricks && yarn deploy:midi-bricks-electron-ci
scripts.deploy:midi-bricks: cd packages/midi-bricks/ && yarn deploy && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.deploy:midi-bricks-ci: cd packages/midi-bricks/ && yarn deploy-ci && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.deploy:midi-bricks-doc: cd packages/midi-bricks-doc/ && yarn && yarn deploy && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.deploy:midi-bricks-electron: cd packages/midi-bricks/ && yarn build && yarn release && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.deploy:midi-bricks-electron-ci: cd packages/midi-bricks/ && yarn build && yarn pack && yarn release-ci && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.precommit: yarn test && cd packages/midi-bricks/ && yarn test && cd ..
